resources.string: Let\'s connect to Barcode Buddy!\n\nPlease open Barcode Buddy, go to the API menu and click on the three dots in the top right corner, to select \"Add mobile app\". Then scan the displayed QR code.
Invalid QR code, no setup info found.
Please update your Barcode Buddy server.
Connected! Tap on the barcode picture to start scanning.
Sorry, Barcode Buddy has crashed. Please click on okay to send us an email for debugging. You can also add info in the field below.
